privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At Planner and Personal Assistant, we value the privacy of our users and are committed to protecting their personal information. This privacy policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.description: We may collect the following information from you:

items.personalInfo: Personal information (name, surname, date of birth, etc.)
items.deviceInfo: Device information (device model, operating system, app version, etc.)
items.usageInfo: Usage information (such as your activities and interactions with the app)

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.description: We use your information for the following purposes:

items.betterServices: Providing better and more efficient services
items.communication: Communicating with you to provide important information and updates
items.performanceAnalysis: Analyzing and improving the performance of the app
items.lawCompliance: Ensuring compliance with relevant laws and regulations
items.advertising: Sending notifications and promotional messages (with your consent)

section3.title: 3. Protection of Information
section3.description: We are committed to protecting your personal information and use appropriate security measures to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction of information. Your information is kept confidential and will not be misused or shared with third parties.

section4.title: 4. Sharing of Information
section4.description: We do not share your information with third parties, except in the following cases:

items.subsidiaries: With subsidiaries and affiliates to provide better services
items.businessPartners: With business partners who help us provide and improve services (subject to confidentiality obligations)

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.description: You have the right to access your information and, if necessary, correct or delete it. You can also request that the use of your information be restricted. To exercise these rights, you can contact us.

section6.title: 6. Transparency in Data Management
section6.description: We are transparent in how we manage user data. Information collected from users includes device information and personal information used within specified frameworks. We inform our users about how data is accessed, collected, used, and shared, and limit the use of data to the stated purposes.

section7.title: 7. Use of Information for Advertising
section7.description: Apps that use data to provide advertisements must comply with our advertising policy.

section8.title: 8. Hidden Costs
section8.description: The use of the app should not create hidden costs for the user. For example, the app should not send SMS or make phone calls without the user's permission. All steps should be transparently communicated to the user.

section9.title: 9. Data Security
section9.description: We securely manage all personal and sensitive user data, including its transmission using modern encryption (e.g., HTTPS).

section10.title: 10. Access to Installed Apps Inventory
section10.description: Apps that access the inventory of installed apps on the user's device must obtain user permission and mention this in the privacy section.

section11.title: 11. Runtime Permission Requests
section11.description: Request the necessary app permissions at runtime as much as possible.

section12.title: 12. Prohibition of Selling Information
section12.description: You are not allowed to sell the user's sensitive and personal information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us:
